comments.base_folder: Root folder containing effect subfolders. Each effect folder should have 'Source', 'Generated_Video', and 'Metadata' subfolders.
comments.output_group_tasks_by: Set to 0 (or omit) to create one report with all effects. Set to N (e.g., 4) to group N effects into one combined report. Example: with 8 effects and group_tasks_by=3, creates 3 reports (3+3+2).
comments.tasks: Each task represents a Pixverse effect. The effect name must match the subfolder name in base_folder.
